text: Sano ndema jaŵajinjile ŵanganyao yaŵatite pakwapanga baba ŵao, nganiiŵa yakwakamuchisya ŵanganyao ku chilichose chakuumila kwa Allah, pangaŵaga chisako chachaliji mu ntima mwa Yaakubu nichiŵachikwanilisye (Yaakubu chakusaka kwaŵambasya ku makungu). Soni chisimu jwalakwe (Yaakubu) jwaliji ni umanyilisi ligongo lyakun’jiganya Kwetu, nambo kuti ŵandu ŵajinji ngakumanyilila
